Source.Name: darktable
Source.Summary: darktable is an open source photography workflow application and RAW developer.
Source.Description: darktable is an open source photography workflow application and RAW developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them.

Package.Name: darktable
Package.Summary: darktable is an open source photography workflow application and RAW developer.
Package.Description: darktable is an open source photography workflow application and RAW developer. A virtual lighttable and darkroom for photographers. It manages your digital negatives in a database, lets you view them through a zoomable lighttable and enables you to develop raw images and enhance them.
